import React from "react"; import { Link } from "react-router-dom"; import { Row, Col, Card, ListGroup, Button, Image } from "react-bootstrap"; import Rating from "../components/Rating"; import products from "../products"; function ProductPage({ match }) { const product = products.find((p) => p._id === match.params.id); return (
Go Back

{product.name}

 Price: ${product.price} Description: {product.description} Price: ${product.price} Status: {product.countInStock > 0 ? 'In Stock' : 'Out of Stock'}
); } export default ProductPage;
